articles.title: Recipients of AstraZeneca Covid vaccine must watch out for five concerning after effects - Express
articles.description: UNDER-40s are to be offered an alternative to the Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine. This is due to the blood clot risk the vaccine carries. However, for the many people who have already had this type of jab, they're being issued a warning.
